description: The Riserva High NBK GTX is designed for demanding hunting experiences in wet conditions. The boot features an upper made with Italian nubuck leather of the highest quality, an iconic Vibram outsole and a Gore-Tex® membrane which together deliver outstanding product reliability. Hand made in Montebelluna, Italy.
name: Aku Riserva Hi NBK GTX - Mens

specs.value: Keep your feet dry in all conditions with the integrated waterproof Gore-Tex Performance Comfort membrane
